name: rev
title: rev manual page
description: The rev utility copies the specified files to the standard output, reversing the order of characters in every line.

sections.title: NAME
codeBlocks:
rev â€“ reverse lines of a file
     rev [file ...]
     The rev utility copies the specified files to the standard output,
     reversing the order of characters in every line.  If no files are
     specified, the standard input is read.
     Reverse the text from stdin:

	   $ echo -e "reverse \t these\ntwo lines" | rev
	   eseht    esrever
	   senil owt

examples.output:
eseht    esrever
	   senil owt
macOS 15.5			 June 27, 2020			    macOS 15.5
